name: Froggis Bueller's Day Off
description:
Froggis Bueller's Day Off is an arcade game where you try to avoid the water and eat as many flies as you can.

This game was made for Mini Jam 106: Frogs^2. The limitation of the jam was "Limited Time."

Music by Ben Beardall

CONTROLS

Keyboard/Mouse:

  • Left-click to eat
  • Right-click to jump

Gamepad:

  • right joystick + right trigger to eat
  • left joystick + left trigger to jump
